value.title: Minute Micro - Episode 18: Bunker vs Spine
value.excerpt: Difficulty rating: 9/10  Minute Micro is a series of 1-minute videos explaining how to perform common micro techniques. This episode is on killing spines with bunkers.  twitch.tv/Quasarprintf

value.title: Learn Starcraft - Beginner Timing Attacks & All-Ins (Terran, Zerg & Protoss)
value.excerpt: A few basic builds that can get you far when done fairly well. Also important is how not to overextend and lose everything.

value.title: Learn Starcraft - Build Orders Vs Zerg (Terran, Zerg & Protoss Build Guide)
value.excerpt: A build as each race versus Zerg! These are general build guides, not exact textbook orders, because no plan survives contact with the enemy! Timestamps: 0:15 - Terran vs Zerg 11:00 - Protoss vs Zerg 24:00 - Zerg vs Zerg

value.title: Learn Starcraft! - Terran v Zerg Mech Build Order! (Updated 2018)
value.excerpt: A basic mech build to roast and toast the horrendous zerg. Meant for lower level players looking for some direction! -- Watch live at https://www.twitch.tv/wintergaming
